Implementation approach: We will use a greedy approach to solve this problem. We will iterate over the array of numbers and for each number, we will calculate the k-th digit of MagicInteger(l,v) for each request. If the length of MagicInteger(l,v) is smaller than k, we will output "So sad" without quotes.
Data structures and interfaces:
classDiagram
    class Main {
        -nums: list[int]
        -requests: list[tuple[int, int, int]]
        +__init__(nums: list[int], requests: list[tuple[int, int, int]])
        +solve()
    }
Program call flow:
sequenceDiagram
    participant M as Main
    M->>M: __init__(nums, requests)
    M->>M: solve()
